alert.note: Alert for Dukes (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued June 05 at 2:53AM EDT until June 06 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.0 to 3.6 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Dukes MA County. * WHEN...From this evening through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Vineyard Haven MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 05/01 PM 2.2/ 2.7 0.2/ 0.7 0.6/ 1.1 3 None 06/02 AM 2.7/ 3.2 0.8/ 1.3 0.8/ 1.3 1 None 06/02 PM 2.2/ 2.7 0.2/ 0.7 0.5/ 1.0 1 None 07/03 AM 2.1/ 2.6 0.1/ 0.6 0.2/ 0.7 1 None 07/03 PM 2.0/ 2.5 0.0/ 0.5 0.2/ 0.8 1 None &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
